Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne endio,shiyabetsela Omurumwa yesi yesi khubali imbeli wabu halali baboola mbu: “Oyo ni Omulosi nohomba Omulalu”
Ne koo baboolanila kano? halali bo ni Abandu abakhayi
Mana lekhana ninabo, nawe sholafunanibwa tawe
Ne itsulisia, toto ametsulisio kakhoonyanga Abasuubili
Ne shindaloonga Majini nende Abandu halali khulwokhunaama esie
Ne Shebenyakhwo omukabo tawe, ne shindenya bandisie tawe
Toto Nyasaye niye Omukabi, Owamani amanji
Ne toto balia abamabii, bali nende tsimbi tsiabu shinga tsimbi tsia abaashiabwe. kho balayungubasia tawe
Ne eshinyasio eshikhongo khubalia bakhaya inyanga yabu yabalakwa
Nditsuba khulukulu lwa Tur
Nende khushitabu shiahandikwa
Khuliseelo liabambulwa
Nende khunzu yombakhwa
Nende khushitsafu shiachingulwa
Nende khunyanza yetsula
Toto eshinyasio shia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi shilibaho
Abulaho ulishikalila
Inyanga yelikulu lilirenga okhurenga khwene
Ne tsingulu lwatsilikulukha bukulukha
Eshinyasio eshikhongo inyanga eyo shiliba khubayingani
Balia babayanga mumakhuwa kobusilu
Inyanga yabaliluumwa mumulilo obutinyu
Baliboolewa mbu: “Kuno niko omulilo kwa mwaingananga.”
